Help.question: The main question or title of the bet that players will see.
Help.type: Choose the betting format: Multiple Choice for options, Match for exact score predictions, Range for number guessing.
Help.startTime: When the event starts. Betting will be locked before this time based on your lock setting.
Help.eventEndTime: Optional: Set this for long-running bets (e.g., season MVP, weekly stats). Auto-resolution waits until this time passes.
Help.lockBetting: When betting closes. 'At Start' locks at kick-off, other options lock earlier for safety.
Help.options: Add the possible outcomes players can bet on. Minimum 2 options required.
Help.homeTeam: The home team for this match. Used for displaying team logos.
Help.awayTeam: The away team for this match. Used for displaying team logos.
Help.rangeMin: The minimum value players can guess.
Help.rangeMax: The maximum value players can guess.
Help.rangeUnit: The unit of measurement (e.g., goals, points, seconds).
Help.projectLeague: Enter a sports league or topic (e.g., 'Premier League', 'NBA', 'Champions League').
Help.timeframe: Specify when the events occur (e.g., 'This Weekend', 'Next Week', 'Today').
Help.bulkType: Choose between exact score predictions or winner choice bets.
Help.outcomeOptions: 1x2 includes Draw option, Winner is 2-way (no draw).
Help.leagueName: A unique name for your betting league visible to all members.
Help.leagueMode: Arcade: Play for points, highest score wins. Zero-Sum: Real betting simulation with dynamic odds.
Help.buyInType: Fixed: Everyone starts with same points. Flexible: Players can buy points anytime.
Help.startCapital: How many points each player starts with.
Help.rebuyUnit: The standard amount for purchasing additional points.
Help.endDate: When the league ends. A winner is determined after this date.
Help.aiAutoPopulate: Let AI find upcoming matches and create bets automatically.
Help.disputeWindow: Time players have to dispute a result before it's finalized.
Help.aiAutoConfirm: Automatically resolve bets using AI when events finish. Saves manual work.
Help.points_winner: Points awarded for correctly predicting the match winner.
Help.points_diff: Points awarded for predicting correct goal difference.
Help.points_exact: Points awarded for predicting the exact score.
Help.points_choice: Points awarded for correct multiple choice answers.
Help.points_range: Points awarded for correct range/number predictions.
Help.powerBoost: Multiply your points reward with a power-up. Higher risk, higher reward!
Help.wagerAmount: How many points to bet. You'll lose these if wrong, win based on odds if correct.
Help.confirmNow: Skip the proofing period and immediately finalize this bet with payouts.
Help.resetBet: Reset this bet back to LOCKED status. Use if the result was entered incorrectly.
Help.dispute: Challenge this result if you believe it's incorrect. Admins will review.

admin.menuDesc: For Admins & Owners. Learn how to manage bets and run the show.
admin.slide1Text: Start your own betting league in seconds. Give it a name, choose the mode, and invite your friends (or enemies).
admin.slide2Text: Just type what you want to bet on (e.g., 'Champions League Final') and our AI will generate the title, odds, and details for you.
admin.slide2Details: Our AI scans real schedules to create bets in one click. It handles the boring data entry so you can focus on the fun.
admin.slide3Text: You control the flow. Bets open automatically. After the game, you resolve the result. If players dispute, you handle the voting.
admin.slide3Details: The Admin has the power to correct results. But beware: The community can dispute results if they disagree!

player.menuDesc: For Players. Learn how to bet, understand modes, and win points.
player.slide1Text: Use an invite code or QR code to join a league. You get starting points to wager.
player.slide2Text: Place your wager when OPEN. Once LOCKED, wait for the game. After the game, there's a 12h PROOFING period before you get paid.
player.slide2Details: Proofing is a 12-hour safety window after a result is entered. Any player can dispute the result if they believe it's wrong. No dispute = Automatic Payout.
player.slide3Text: In ARCADE, you play for points that accumulate - whoever has the most points wins. In ZERO SUM, it's real-world betting with dynamic odds based on the pot.
player.slide3Details: Zero Sum has two modes: SUDDEN DEATH (fixed starting points, 0 pts = game over) and UNCAPPED (unlimited rebuy, no elimination). Arcade is about accumulating points through correct predictions with fixed payouts.
